languages.text: "Форму запретов, установленных неведомыми старцами. Форму дерзновения, с которым эти запреты нарушаются. Форму следования догме или раскола. Форму следования Циклу и прерывания Цикла. В системе, имеющей два пути действия, схизма неизбежна. И лишь один из путей окажется верен, потому что истина дискретно отделена от не-истины". {n}Визор Паскаля будто проницает вас своим свечением.{/n}

"The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Форму запретов, установленных неведомыми старцами. Форму дерзновения, с которым эти запреты нарушаются. Форму следования догме или раскола. Форму следования Циклу и прерывания Цикла. В системе, имеющей два пути действия, схизма неизбежна. И лишь один из путей окажется верен, потому что истина дискретно отделена от не-истины". {n}Визор Паскаля будто проницает вас своим свечением.{/n}

languages.text: “这些形式可能是由某些不知名的长老制定的禁令，也可能是大胆违背禁令的行为；可能是遵循教条，也可能是产生分裂；可能是遵循循环，也可能是终止循环。只要系统中拥有两种不同的行动模式，分裂就不可避免。而在这些道路之中，只有一条道路通往真理，因为真理与谬误势同水火，不可兼容。”{n}帕斯卡的面甲发出了光芒，似乎要将你刺穿。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这些形式可能是由某些不知名的长老制定的禁令，也可能是大胆违背禁令的行为；可能是遵循教条，也可能是产生分裂；可能是遵循循环，也可能是终止循环。只要系统中拥有两种不同的的行动模式，分裂就不可避免。而在这些道路之中，只有一条道路通往真理，因为真理与谬误势同水火，不可兼容。”{n}帕斯卡的面甲发出了光芒，似乎要将你刺穿。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La forma las de prohibiciones establecidas por ancianos desconocidos. La forma de una infracción audaz de esas prohibiciones. La forma de seguir el dogma o el cisma. La forma de seguir el Ciclo o detener el Ciclo. En un sistema con dos posibles acciones, el cisma es inevitable. Y solo uno de los dos caminos será verdadero, pues la verdad es algo diferente a la falsedad». {n}El brillo del visor de Pasqal parece atravesarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La forma las de prohibiciones establecidas por ancianos desconocidos. La forma de una infracción audaz de esas prohibiciones. La forma de seguir el dogma o el cisma. La forma de seguir el Ciclo o detener el Ciclo. En un sistema con dos posibles acciones, el cisma es inevitable. Y solo uno de los dos caminos será verdadero, pues la verdad es algo diferente a la falsedad». {n}El brillo del visor de Pasqal parece atravesarte.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「無名の長老が定めた禁止事項の形。その禁止事項を大胆に破るという形。教義に従う形、あるいは分裂の形。サイクルに従うか、サイクルを止めるか。2つの行動指針を持つシステムでは、分裂は避けられない。そして、真理につながる道は一つだけ。真理は真理に非ざるものから切り離されているのだから」{n}パスカルのバイザーは、その輝きであなたを貫くかのようにひらめいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「無名の長老が定めた禁止事項の形。その禁止事項を大胆に破るという形。教義に従う形、あるいは分裂の形。サイクルに従うか、サイクルを止めるか。2つの行動指針を持つシステムでは、分裂は避けられない。そして、真理につながる道は一つだけ。真理は真理に非ざるものから切り離されているのだから」{n}パスカルのバイザーは、その輝きであなたを貫くかのようにひらめいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Form von Verboten, die von unbekannten Ahnen erlassen wurden. Die Form eines verwegenen Verstoßes gegen diese Verbote. Die Form, dem Dogma zu folgen oder eine Spaltung zu verursachen. Die Form, dem Kreislauf zu folgen oder ihn zu unterbrechen. In einem System mit zwei möglichen Handlungsoptionen ist eine Spaltung unausweichlich. Und nur einer dieser Pfade wird der wahre sein, wie die Wahrheit strikt von der Unwahrheit getrennt ist." {n}Pasqals Visor scheint dich mit seinem Glühen fast zu durchbohren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Form von Verboten, die von unbekannten Ahnen erlassen wurden. Die Form eines verwegenen Verstoßes gegen diese Verbote. Die Form, dem Dogma zu folgen oder eine Spaltung zu verursachen. Die Form, dem Kreislauf zu folgen oder ihn zu unterbrechen. In einem System mit zwei möglichen Handlungsoptionen ist eine Spaltung unausweichlich. Und nur einer dieser Pfade wird der wahre sein, wie die Wahrheit strikt von der Unwahrheit getrennt ist." {n}Pasqals Visor scheint dich mit seinem Glühen fast zu durchbohren.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La forme des interdictions établies par des anciens inconnus. La forme d'une violation audacieuse de ces interdictions. La forme d'un dogme que l'on suit, ou d'un schisme. La forme d'un cycle que l'on suit, ou que l'on interrompt. Dans un système où les actions peuvent prendre deux voies, la scission est inévitable, et seule l'une de ces voies sera juste, la vérité étant distinctement séparée de l'erreur. » {n}La lumière émise par la visière de Pasqal semble presque vous transpercer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La forme des interdictions établies par des anciens inconnus. La forme d'une violation audacieuse de ces interdictions. La forme d'un dogme que l'on suit, ou d'un schisme. La forme d'un cycle que l'on suit, ou que l'on interrompt. Dans un système où les actions peuvent prendre deux voies, la scission est inévitable, et seule l'une de ces voies sera juste, la vérité étant distinctement séparée de l'erreur. » {n}La lumière émise par la visière de Pasqal semble presque vous transpercer.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

languages.text: "Bilinmeyen atalar tarafından kurulmuş yasakların biçimini. Bunların küstahça ihlalinin biçimini. Bir dogmayı takip etmenin veya bölünmenin biçimini. Bir Döngü'yi izlemenin veya Döngü süreğinin bozulumunun biçimini. İki eylemin mümkün olduğu bir sistemde bölünme kaçınılmazdır. Yalnızca ikisinden biri doğru olacaktır. Nihayetinde doğru, doğru olmayandan net bir şekilde ayrıdır." {n}Pasqal'ın vizörü, ışıltısıyla tüm vücudunu sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The form of prohibitions established by unknown elders. The form of an audacious violation of those prohibitions. The form of following dogma, or of schism. The form of following the Cycle, or of discontinuing the Cycle. In a system with two courses of action, schism is inevitable. And only one of these paths will be true, as truth is discretely separate from untruth." {n}Pasqal's visor seems to almost pierce you with its glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bilinmeyen atalar tarafından kurulmuş yasaklamaların biçimi. Bu yasakların küstahça ihlalinin biçimi. Bir dogmayı takip etmenin veya bölünmenin biçimi. Bir Döngü'yi izlemenin veya Döngü'ye devam etmemenin biçimi. İki eylemin mümkün olduğu bir sistemde bölünme kaçınılmazdır. Bu yolların da yalnızca bir tanesi doğru olacaktır. Nihayetinde doğru, doğru olmayandan net bir şekilde ayrıdır." {n}Pasqal'ın vizörünün ışıltısı seni neredeyse delip geçecek gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
